CelebrationPage.title: CelebrationPage
CelebrationPage.description: Represents a single interactive celebration landing page, containing all events and media.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CelebrationPage entity.

title.description: The main title displayed prominently on the page (e.g., 'Happy Anniversary!').

recipientName.description: The full name of the person or group being celebrated.

creatorName.description: The name of the user who created this celebration page.

occasion.description: The type of celebration (e.g., Birthday, Anniversary, Graduation, Wedding).

accessCode.description: A secret code required to securely access this particular page.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the celebration page was initially created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the celebration page was last updated.

BirthdayEvent.title: BirthdayEvent
BirthdayEvent.description: Represents a single chronological event or memory to be displayed as an interactive card on the timeline.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BirthdayEvent entity.

celebrationPageId.description: Reference to the CelebrationPage this event belongs to.

eventDate.description: The specific date associated with this event.

title.description: A concise title for the event card.

message.description: The celebratory message or a memorable quote associated with this event.

order.description: An integer representing the display order.

imageUrl.description: URL for the image associated with this event.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when this event record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when this event record was last updated.
